projects.title: Het Cockpit Project
projects.pageDescription: During my internship at Zes Goes, a fast-growing repair and service company, I contributed to their operations by gaining hands-on experience with their advanced IT system, Zir Online. This system streamlines the management of internal and external processes, ensuring accurate and timely service delivery. The supportive work environment and excellent guidance at Zes Goes allowed me to grow both personally and professionally. My advice to other students is to embrace opportunities to learn and focus on building practical skills.
projects.labels: Internship, Python, Django, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap

projects.title: Pasimo
projects.description: With this application, students can scan their cards to clock in automatically, and teachers can manage their students.
projects.pageDescription: This project utilizes Java, Hibernate, and Struts2 to create an application that facilitates various functionalities for both students and teachers. Through this system, students have the ability to scan their identification cards, enabling automatic clock-ins. On the other hand, teachers are empowered with tools to effectively manage their students, overseeing attendance and other related tasks seamlessly.
projects.labels: Java, Hibernate, Struts2, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap

projects.title: SlideHub
projects.description: This application allows you to create slides that can loop continuously on multiple TVs using a Raspberry Pi. This application is used inside or school and soon to be many more!
projects.pageDescription: This application, built using Java along with the Hibernate and Struts2 frameworks, enables you to create and manage slideshows that loop continuously on multiple TVs via Raspberry Pi devices. It provides a user-friendly interface for designing slides, complete with text, images, and other multimedia elements. Once the slides are created, they can be organized into a sequence and deployed to the connected TVs, ensuring seamless and synchronized display across all screens.
projects.labels: Java, Hibernate, Struts2, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap

projects.title: QR-Goats
projects.description: Scan your digital QR code to clock in. You'll also be able to report sickness and lateness through this app. This will be utilized by the students of the Software Developer program at Scalda.
projects.pageDescription: The app is built using Java, Hibernate, and Struts2. With it, students can easily clock in and out by scanning a QR code. They can also report if they're sick or running late right in the app. It's all designed to make attendance tracking simple and hassle-free for students in Scalda's Software Developer program.
projects.labels: Java, Hibernate, Struts2, SQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap
